諯字的基本解释

諯
zhuān
数。
相让。

諯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuān］
［《廣韻》職緣切，平仙，章。］
［《廣韻》市緣切，平仙，禪。］
［《廣韻》尺絹切，去線，昌。］
［《廣韻》七絹切，去線，清。］
(1)数责；责让。
(2)相退让。

諯字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諯； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1171第05
【廣韻】職緣切【集韻】【類篇】朱遄切，?音專。【說文】數也。一曰相讓也。又【呂覽·任地篇】草諯大月。　又人名。與諯、崇諯，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【廣韻】純緣切【集韻】淳沿切，?音遄。又【集韻】【類篇】?直碾切，纏去聲。又【玉篇】【唐韻】尺絹切【集韻】樞絹切，?音釧。又【集韻】翾縣切，音絢。或作䛹。義?同。

諯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
諯字的起名意思

暂无。

number.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [zhuān]
["Guangyun" job margin cut, Pingxian, chapter. ]
["Guangyun" City Yuanqi, Pingxian, Zen. ]
["Guangyun" ruler silk cut, remove the thread, Chang. ]
["Guangyun" seven silk cut, thread removed, clear. ]
(1) Number of responsibilities; responsibility.
(2) Give in.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　諯; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1171 05
[Guang Yun] Career Origins [Ji Yun] [Classes] Zhu Dunqie, specializing in music. [Said the text] The number is also. One said to give in. Also 【Lv Lan·Rendi Chapter】Cross-bearded big moon.　Another name. With the beard and the chong beard, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Guangyun] Pure Fate Cut [Ji Yun] Chun along the cut,? Yin Shu. Also [Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Straighten and cut, twisting sound. Also [Jade articles] [Tang Yun] ruler silk cut [Jiyun] hinge silk cut,? Yin Chuan. Also 【Jiyun】Yixian cut, the sound is gorgeous. Or do it. Righteous? Same.
